amendment.description: To revise the section requiring a study of preventable injuries and deaths of minority children related to certain consumer products.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4138 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4138 proposed by Senator Pryor for Senator Inouye. (consideration: CR S1693-1696; text: CR S1696) To revise the section requiring a study of preventable injuries and deaths of minority children related to certain consumer products.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4138 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4138 proposed by Senator Pryor for Senator Inouye.
